title: Greenbelt Park: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip        The Sweetgum Picnic Area is a good destination for school trips. Sweetgum has picnic tables, bathroom facilities, playground equipment, the Azalea trail for trail walks, and a good place for environmental education.  Please call us for more information.  This area is a non reserved area with 4 tables, 24 people maximum.The park is dealing with a serious tick issue.  If you decide to use the park, please use tick repellant.
